name: Cannon Army
summary: Trained at the U.S. Army Camp, you have been a part of US Army forces for a long time now. Get ready to fight the war on crime in the immersive situation against a group of terrorists trying to suppress the nation with their evil plans. Choose one of the 4 available soldiers and use wisely you riffle. Collect grenades and power-ups to succeed in this never-ending game that guarantees long hours of fun. Your country needs you !
